about_me.des: Enthusiastic full stack engineer with a passion for travelling and sports like mountain biking, kick boxing and swimming.

projects.apnello: Single page website built using jQuery, w3css framework, HTML5, jssor slider
projects.apnoblesse: Single page website built using jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML5.
projects.etwin: This was a project during my 3th year in school where we spoke with another student class in Spain. We've done some posts about the new technology an sharing our knowledge eachothers.
projects.mm: Built a smart mirror for my final exam. Used raspberry pi and magicmirror.
projects.cisco: During my schooltime i've got the Cisco ITE essential certificate and also the first certificate of CCNA

career.pizzeria_des: During my experience as a chef at Pizzeria dai butei i have lernt how to collaborate and communicate in a clear manner with other people in a professional environment and work in a team. I also had the opportunitu to comunicate in English with tourists as well  as develop time management skills, attention to detail and work under pressure in a fast paced environment.
career.school_des: I graduated 'G. Marconi -  Verona' with a specialization in Informatics. I managed to get a good understanding of Computer Science by learning and implementing projects using programming languages like Python, Java and Javascript. I have also studied the basics of databases while using MySql. Most projects I worked on were team projects but I also worked on individual smaller projects.
